document_data.name: Alystin Xorlarrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Alystin Xorlarrin''' was a [[drow]] of [[House Xorlarrin]] and a twin daughter of the archmage of [[Q'Xorlarrin]], [[Tsabrak Xorlarrin]].
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], during the [[War of the Silver Marches]], Tsabrak appointed Alystin and her twin brother [[Alak Xorlarrin]] to find and take control of the [[Fell Fortress]] in order to create an [[undead]] army. However, an adventuring party hired by the [[dwarf]] mystic [[Axelcrantz]] confronted and defeated them.
